VIII.iii.2.B.1.e
.
Notifying VA Outpatient Clinics of Decisions Involving SC TB
If a Veteran is awarded the
two-year, 100-percent disability evaluation for inactive TB, notify the Chief, Medical Administration Services, or equivalent, of the outpatient clinic responsible for the Veteran’s follow-up care, or
one-year, 100-percent disability evaluation for inactive TB,
send the outpatient clinic responsible for the Veteran’s follow-up care a copy of the rating decision in which VA initially granted service connection for TB, and
do
not
send any other notice to the Chief, Medical Administration Services, of the outpatient clinic responsible for the Veteran’s follow-up care.
Reference
:  For more information on TB, see
M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, 4.B
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iii, Chapter 2, Section B - Awards for Graduated Tuberculosis (TB)
